title: Failed to Redeem Permanent skin shard
body:
I unlocked  Battle Cast Cho'gath  but when i click "unlock skin permanent" it pops up with a redeem failed.

https://imgur.com/aesSBkP
https://imgur.com/2Mv26ix

replies.body: Hey I've seen this happen sometimes, it's a weird issue.  It sounds a little crazy, but try spam redeeming it as that may actually resolve this.  Let me know if it helps!
